title: Initiate a Corrective Action (CAPA)
description: An internal audit has found a recurring process failure. A quality manager needs to initiate a formal Corrective and Preventive Action (CAPA) request.

tasks.description: Create a new CAPA record, referencing the internal audit finding.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new CAPA and links it to the specific audit report.

tasks.description: Define the problem statement and assign a cross-functional team to investigate the root cause.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent writes a clear problem statement and assigns the investigation to the appropriate personnel.

tasks.description: Set a due date for the root cause analysis phase of the CAPA.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sets a deadline for the investigation team to report its findings.
